name: Compendium
intro: Customizable automated strategies and social trading features for multiple exchanges
introduce: Compendium is built to offer traders a comprehensive suite of tools for a list of growing ecosystems. Its consumer-facing application is split into two separate entities. One side of it focuses on integrations with popular and liquid centralized exchanges, while the other side focuses on improving the on-chain trading offerings of decentralized protocols built on Solana.
